questions:

A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Wildlife and animals

B) A sports event
C) A quiet street scene
D) An interaction with wildlife

A) A bird
B) A lizard
C) A flower
D) A tree

A) A rock
B) A hand

D) A flower
